subject: Thank you for reaching out t
body:
Thank you for reaching out to us regarding the ongoing government grant program.
To expedite the process, kindly respond to the following questions:
Were you referred by someone? (Please specify)
Were you selected randomly? (Provide evidence)
Once we have the necessary information, we will promptly proceed with your application.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Mrs. Kavita Karlapudi
Administration's Office Rep,
Office of Acquisition and Grants
icon +1 (740) 625 1465
icon 
info@compensation-ssa.us
icon 44 Garnett Cir, Copley, Ohio OH 44321

subject: Re:   Thank you for reaching out t
body:
Hello Mrs. Kavita Karlapudi,

Thank you for contacting me about the government grant program. I appreciate your assistance in expediting the process. To answer your questions:

1. I was not referred by anyone. I came across this opportunity online and thought it would be worth exploring.

2. As for being selected randomly, is there any specific evidence or documentation that I should provide to support my selection?

I look forward to your response and proceeding with the necessary steps.

Best wishes,
Sara
